name: TOON
description:
TOON is a First Person Shooter game.

- PROCEDURAL LEVEL GENERATION -


Each level is procedural with random elements so you will be faced with unique levels each time you play.

The fast-paced action is spiced up with a beautiful art found throughout the procedural level generation each time you play.

- PUNCHES -


Gameplay
The player enter into a procedural generated level and need to clear the entire level from enemies to go to the next level.

Features
- Every game is different - procedural levels
- Amazing Art
- Black and White Mode

- BLACK AND WHITE MODE -
